description: Creates a text message with an XML body from a message reference and a memory. The XML has a 2-level hierarchy with a root tag and sub elements. The root tag is created from the root reference and the elements are created from the messages in the memory.

properties.name: roottag
properties.label: Root XML Tag
properties.description: Name of the enclosing root XML tag

properties.name: rootattr
properties.label: Root XML Attribute Names
properties.description: Provide the XML attribute names of the root XML tag.

properties.name: rootprops
properties.label: Root Property Names
properties.description: Provide the names of the properties that provide the values of the corresponding root XML attributes.

properties.name: eletag
properties.label: Element XML Tag
properties.description: Name of the element XML tag

properties.name: eleattr
properties.label: Element XML Attribute Names
properties.description: Provide the XML attribute names of the element XML tag.

properties.name: eleprops
properties.label: Element Property Names
properties.description: Provide the names of the properties that provide the values of the corresponding element XML attributes.
